title: Shelley’s Revenge
author: VD
content_html:
Remember when Scott Adams told us he made the best possible decision to get the vaccine since it was necessary in order to travel, to which the alternative was divorce? Yeah, so, about that….

But in every cloud, there is a silver lining. Perhaps even The Best Thing That Ever Happened!

DISCUSS ON SG
